Our brand values

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Read more
“ByE keeps up and implements the modern trends, ensuring that the collection appeals to the target audience.”

Quality

ByE develops and makes its own products in the Elements Factory, meaning that we can keep an eye on the quality level. We make sure that the quality level meets our standard, from the initial materials up to the final finishing stage. Quality is of paramount importance to ByE. Having our own wide range of products means that we have tested the products over time and have tackled potential quality problems and can generate more efficiency in the production process.

Transparancy

ByE sees transparency and communication as a vital component in long term business relationships. Clarity about the production process, pricing and possibilities, but also close communication in case of unforeseen obstacles or future developments is essential in mutual growth.

“Indonesia offers the craftsmanship and a rich range of natural materials to make alluring, timeless furniture and accessories.”

Communication

Communication between ByE and the customers is critical. Keeping customers informed about their orders and responding to their needs is an essential procedure. ByE is established in Indonesia where we have a skilled and experienced team that speak English, Indonesian and Dutch. The grasp of the different languages, cultures and production experience makes us a competent production partner to work with. ByE apprehends both the Indonesian and the international business values.

Innovation

Innovation and continuing development of products is key in staying ahead. A distinctive, yet neutral, style by selecting the right materials and working with skilled craftsmen gives the collection its character. Each year we will present a new collection.

Hier komt een pakkende titel die why work with us samenvat

We are a European company that has its roots entrenched in Indonesia. We understand the local as well as the international side of the production process and supply chain. Extensive experience, unique designs, control over the production process, understanding the needs of different markets, clear communication and innovation in a dynamic furniture industry are a few sharp advantages that we offer.

Why work with us
